description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' using Google Mock for testing purposes. It mocks an interface that combines 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink', providing mock implementations for numerous methods related to a service or plugin in the WPEFramework environment.
external_methods: Mock methods from Google Mock framework

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class for 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' and 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell::ICOMLink' interfaces, used for unit testing components that depend on these interfaces.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version information of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Provides the locator string for the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Provides the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service is resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature is supported given a uint8_t parameter.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with provided parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with a uint32_t and a JSON element.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with two string parameters.

methods.name: QueryInterfaceByCallsign
methods.description: Queries an interface by call sign.

methods.name: Unavailable
methods.description: Marks the service as unavailable with a reason.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Sets configuration line with a string.

methods.name: Instantiate
methods.description: Creates an instance of a remote object.
